member.name: STREAM_INFO_LEVELS
member.summary: Defines values that are used with the function to specify the information level of the returned data.

member.name: STREAM_INFO_LEVELS.FindStreamInfoStandard
member.summary: The function retrieves standard stream information. The data is returned in a structure.

member.name: STREAM_INFO_LEVELS.FindStreamInfoMaxInfoLevel
member.summary: Used to determine valid enumeration values. All supported enumeration values are less thanFindStreamInfoMaxInfoLevel.
